pluginstrument.author: Pavel Brodsky
pluginstrument.description: Meteo system AMS.3 based on real-life LKPR equipment Can display weather from FSX/P3D (for TowerView when controlling on VATSIM/IVAO) You must install custom panel with custom gauge and LUA script into FSX. Open Resources folder for those files! Optimised for 17" 1280x1024 screens like the real unit :-)
